Vals.com.twofortyfouram.locale.intent.extra.B: ---------Add Time--------- Add Unit: Days Add Value: 1 Output Variable: event_end_
Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%event_end_date Calculated Date Date resulting from the adding of units (hours, days, etc) properly formatted</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1>%event_end_dateisweekday Calculated Date Is Week Day 'true' if the calculated date is on a weekday, 'false' if it's on a weekend.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2>%event_end_datemillis Milliseconds The number of milliseconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970 for the calculated date</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3>%event_end_dateseconds Seconds The number of seconds that have elapsed since January 1, 1970 for the calculated date</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4>%err Error Code Only available if you select <b>Continue Task After Error</b> and the action ends in error</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5>%errmsg Error Message Only available if you select <b>Continue Task After Error</b> and the action ends in error</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5></StringArray>
Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.extras.VARI: TimeOutputVariableCalculation DateMillisCalculations AddUnit AddValue plugininstanceid plugintypeid
